tool.name: Filter Cartagenia Annotated Variants
tool.command: mkdir $output.extra_files_path; $__tool_directory__/downFiltering.py filter --dir $output_vcf.extra_files_path --vcf-output-list $output_vcf #if $input_source.input_source_type == "annotations": --variant-annotations-directory ${input_source.input_directory.extra_files_path} #else: --vcf ${input_source.matrix_file} --rdf ${input_source.rdf_file} --sample-list ${input_source.samplename_file} #end if #if str($exclude_intervals) != "None": --exclude $exclude_intervals #end if --window $window --population-threshold $population_threshold #if str($gtf_file) != "None": --gtf $gtf_file #end if --output $output

param.label: Sample Name files
param.name: samplename_file
param.help: Each line must contain the name of each sample as it appears on the header of both Annotation and RDF matrix

param.label: Exclude intervals
param.name: exclude_intervals
param.help: BED file of regions to exclude
Variants within this window size will be considered part of the same cluster
param.label: Cluster window
param.name: window

param.help: Population variant occurrence percentage threshold for a given cluster
param.label: Population variant ocurrence threshold
param.name: population_threshold

tool.help:
